page.title: Powerful Features for
page.subtitle: Everything you need to enhance your images with cutting-edge AI technology. From text preservation to batch processing, we've got you covered.

section.title: Image quality enhancer that
section.description: No blur, no artifacts—just crisp, professional results. Our AI understands the difference between noise and detail.

textLogos.name: Text & Logos Stay Sharp
textLogos.description: Most AI image enhancers blur text. Ours keeps it crisp—even at 4x scale.

batchUpscale.name: Batch Upscale 500 Images
batchUpscale.description: Bulk photo enhancer. Upload hundreds of images, get 4K results in minutes.

qualityTiers.name: 6 Quality Tiers
qualityTiers.description: From 2x to 8x with 6 enhancement modes. Fine-tune results for photos, graphics, anime, and more.

smartDetection.name: Smart AI Detection
smartDetection.description: Automatically selects the best AI model for your image type. Portraits, landscapes, and more get specialized treatment.
